content: --क्षेमः {1} security of possession, keeping safe of property. {2} the charge for securing property from accidents, insurance. {3} welfare, well-being, security, prosperity; तेषां नित्याभियुक्तानां योगक्षेमं वहाम्यहं <ls>Bg. 9. 22</ls>: मुग्धाया मे जनन्या योगक्षेमं वहस्व <ls>M. 4.</ls> {4} property, profit, gain. (--मौ, --मे or --मं , {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} {%<ab>m.</ab>%} or {%<ab>n.</ab>%} dual or {%<ab>n.</ab>%} <ab>sing.</ab> acquisition and preservation (of property), gain and security, preserving the old and acquiring the new (not previously obtained); अलभ्यलाभो योगः स्यात् क्षेमो लब्धस्य पालनम्; see <ls>Y. 1. 100</ls> and <ls>Mit.</ls> thereon.
